channel.title: Oh wow.. wonderful error.. Bad Command or File name with .bat files
channel.description:
thats pretty much it.. typed in:
[code]@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
and got:
Bad command or file name Bad command or file name Bad command or file name Press any key to continue . . .
Lol... I know that the commands are right because they work on my other computer.. (Its Windows XP this is Windows Millenium if that helps) and ..er.. well yea.. any ideas? :confused:

thats pretty much it… typed in:
